mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( LOCATION_ID, NICKNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, USER_ROLE, CREATEDATE, MODIFYDATE ) VALUES ( #{locationId}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{role}, #{createdDate}, #{modifyDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT USER.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM USER INNER JOIN LOCATION ON USER.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID
SELECT USER.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM USER INNER JOIN LOCATION ON USER.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM USER INNER JOIN LOCATION ON USER.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE EMAIL = #{searchEmail}
SELECT USER.*, LOCATION.CITY_COUNTRY_TOWN as location FROM USER INNER JOIN LOCATION ON USER.LOCATION_ID = LOCATION.LOCATION_ID WHERE NICKNAME = #{searchName}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET EMAIL = #{email}, MODIFYDATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
UPDATE USER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, MODIFYDATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
UPDATE USER SET NICKNAME = #{nickname}, MODIFYDATE = NOW() WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
